data.eml:eml: Thalassodes and related taxa of emerald moths in China (Geometridae, Geometrinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Han, Hongxiang, Xue, Dayong (2011): Thalassodes and related taxa of emerald moths in China (Geometridae, Geometrinae). Zootaxa 3019: 26-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205134
